, says the Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg , on the Andrew Marr Show this morning, was forced to defend the ex-communications chief, Andy Coulson , who resigned from his post on Friday. Andy Coulson has been very clear that he was not in any way responsible for phone hacking and had no knowledge of it. I have no reason to disbelieve him."
